website_summaries.verdict: An extremely heavy-duty machine with a surprisingly low profile.
pros: This robust machine provides one of the quickest ways to shredded abs and strong back
Can be used with or without dumbbells for added resistance
Stitched vinyl classes up the upholstery, while the non-slip footrest ensures stability
Perfect for improving balance and muscular control in the lower body
cons: The abdominal pad is thin and not very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: POS!!
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months of daily use, it suffered a catastrophic failure which could have resulted in a serious facial injury, but God was looking out for me and my face. Two pieces slide together with a plastic bushing to ensure a snug fit. That bushing never wanted to seat correctly and it would always slide up about an inch, causing a little play and wobble. I re-adjusted it after almost every use, but it had caused enough wobble that the metal actually TORE! If you value your eyes, teeth and nose, there are far better choices. This one may leave you flat on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was not completely welded. As a result, it broke when my boyfriend (185 lbs) used it the first time, and gave me a small splinter when I inspected it.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pieces but easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been needing a hyper bench to strengthen my back and this knee gets the job done. All the tools and parts were there and i assembled it myself with no issues. I did use my own tools tho because they just handle better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite workout equiptment in my home gym.
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to put together, sturdy hyper bench. I have been using this for a little over a week now, and I can feel the difference my lower back, core, and glutes. My posture has improved and my lower back pain and SI joint pain is almost non existent! I use this after I use my inversion table to stretch my spine. I would recommend for anyone looking to strengthen their core. Although the box arrived damaged, the inner box was undamaged and there was no damage to the bench. I am so glad for Amazon global- no one else would ship this overseas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. But construct not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It feels really sturdy for the price. And it is easy to store by folding it. So far I found no problem using it and feels safe for couple weeks. Only con is it isn't constructed perfectly straight and square. The front leg is tilted. (I made sure all the screws are tight) Hope that would cause any problem in the long run. I would suggest my friends to it
customer_reviews.author: Chung Chu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price but limited adjustability
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very large person (6'6" and 260 lbs) and was concerned about possible stability issues on the Hyper Bench. After assembling, which was a pretty simple process for one person, I was pleasantly surprised with how sturdy it feels under my weight. I use it for back extensions, abs and dips -- it's an excellent add to our small home gym. I took off one star for adjust-ability. The unit adjusts well to accommodate my height, however there is no way to change the angle for your workout. If you're looking for a sturdy device that gets the basics done -- this one is an excellent option.
customer_reviews.author: RFH

customer_reviews.title: Padding Extremely Sub-Par
customer_reviews.text: While the product is exceptional well built in regards to the metal structure & bolts, the padding is extremely subpar rendering the item unusable. As you can see in the picture of the item, it appears as though there is additional padding at the top, yet it is on the back side of the support and makes no contact with your mid-section during use. All you can feel when attempting to perform hyper-extensions is the wood base, and no padding support. In addition, using this for "roman chair" sit-ups is awkward at best and again, very uncomfortable. Correct this issue, and this piece of exercise equipment would be OK for hyper-extensions only.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this equipment to do abdominal s but found that it was much better to place the leg bolster on the other end as it worked much better. I wished I could get another bolster to help work out my lower back though. Overall this is a very well build piece of equipment that just needed a small modification to suit my own needs which is why I only gave it 4 stars. If the company could provide an extra bolster I would give it a 5 easy.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very functional multi use apparatus
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't know what to expect. Reviews all over the place. Was pleasantly surprised. I am using as a preacher bench and tricep dips. Occasionally hyperextension work. Very functional. No issues at all. Retired bodybuilder and at 245 holds weight fine. My wife likes for back and hamstring work and she is 110 at 5 foot. I do use a pillow when I do hyperextensions for extra padding. That solved any uncomfortable feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Maritime T-Shirts

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great addition to my garage gym
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great addition to my garage gym. It's really compact, folds up for storage, yet is sturdy as heck. The quality and finish are pretty impressive. Was quite easy to put together as well, and I'm challenged in that department :) this was one of the pieces of equipment that I was a little bummed about losing when I put my gym membership on hold so I'm really excited that I'll still be able to get all the benefits of this at home now. I'm eyeballing Staminas adjustable jump platform next.
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this POS should be fired!!!! To attach the two handles you have to be a contortionist to hold both handles on while trying to thread a very short bolt through and screw a nut on. Most idiotic design I have ever seen. Can't tell you how it works since I can't even get the stupid handles attached. WASTE OF MONEY!!!! Oh and the flimsy plastic foot stabilizer came crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe food for taller people
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 and it’s too big for me. I have to stand on my tiptoes even with the chair height positioned below the lowest notch. Probably good for 5’8+ height.
customer_reviews.author: Subaru/Hiking/ClimbingLover-AndMom&Wife

customer_reviews.title: I don't bend like normal ppl so it made by back hurt
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for low back strengthening...IF you don't have severe scoliosis. I don't bend like normal ppl so it made by back hurt. But that's my crooked spine. I highly recommend if you have a straight healthy spine. I just can't strengthen my lower back without pain from all the gazillion methods I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good price.
customer_reviews.text: THis thing is perfect with 0 defaults like what I read prior to buying. Husband and i use it in the garage. I’m 5’4 and HEB is 6’1and so he adjusted to my level so the bar does not sit above hips on my stomach and so it still works for him. For me it’s right at my hip bones but comfortable to go all the way down and up again. Great for lower back and butt.
customer_reviews.author: ErinBecause

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. It is sturdy, easy to put together, and folds up so it can be put out of the way when not in use. My Chiropractor/Physical Therapist at a local Spine Center suggested I do back extensions daily to build up the muscles in the small of my back. This Hyper Bench fit the bill perfectly. Nicely made, easy to use, and a great value for the money. Also, like others have noted in their reviews, a 17mm socket wrench, 17mm open/box end wrench, and a 10mm nut driver are all very helpful in putting this together. There are two wrenches included, but they are thin stamped metal and really only good in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: The Gekko  Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely well made (and the cushion is well padded) and that's great, but I think the design wasn't tested thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: The slope on it is really too steep, gravity pulls me down to the foot rest between every rep instead of being able to balance my body against the upper cushion and the bar that sets behind my legs. It's definitely well made (and the cushion is well padded) and that's great, but I think the design wasn't tested thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: B Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not the unit pictured!
customer_reviews.text: A well-made unit, but the unit I got differs greatly from the photo. There is now a bench on the front part, the forward floor contact piece is "U" shaped, and the rollers are on a pivoting arm. They've apparently modified it to allow for more exercises from a single machine, but that's not what I was expecting. You must completely assemble this unit, down to the last nut and washer. I left off all the pieces I didn't want that are not part of the classic "Roman Chair". It's a lot of excess hardware assembled that way.
customer_reviews.author: Nomdeploom

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I like this piece of equipment. It was extremely easy to put together, it's stable and it works as advertised. It does appear to be for taller individuals. There are 3 holes that you can use as your setting, however I slid the adjustable bar down past the lowest hole and just tightened it. I'm 5'8" and that is perfect for me. So that's not really a complaint, rather just an observation. If I used any one of the other 3 holes it hurt a little in the family jewels area, BUT I found a way around that and I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mikeyforgets

customer_reviews.title: Study little thing!
customer_reviews.text: Super product! Time will tell how it holds up. (I was worried about the welds due to another review on here) Super easy to put together! The deep red is just like the image. The were some compression dents in the padding but Im hoping they will pop out with time. Good heavy metal (that's why im not upset at the crushed padding or squished rubber feet).
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyM.

customer_reviews.title: Will Update
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, and I just wanted to share my initial impressions. Assembly was super simple, as the instructions were easy to follow with step by step diagrams. Did a rushed workout with it, and it felt great. I still need to play around with the height adjustment a little, but overall I am extremely satisfied with this purchase. It's a very solid and nice looking piece of equipment for a very valuable exercise. Also, the bench didn't give me any discomfort in the lower regions/hip area, but that was just my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS WAY BETTER THAN 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS WAY BETTER THAN 5 STARS. IT IS EVERY THING IT'S SUPPOSE TO BE AND MORE. EVERY THING IS PUT SO BEAUTIFUL IN ORDER. I WAS SO EXCITED TO RECEIVE IT. (((JUST LIKE YOU SAID.))) READ THE MANUAL FIRST. IT HAS ALL THE TOOLS YOU NEED. I JUST STOPPED LONG ENOUGH TO TELL YOU I LOVE IT. I HAVE TO TELL YOU ABOUT THE PACKING TOO. IT CAME RIGHT TO MY DOOR. IT WAS PACKED SO GOOD NO SCRATCHES ON THE PAINT JOB. WHAT A NICE PAINT JOB. SOMEONE CARED ABOUT THE CONSTRUCTION. OF THIS STAMINA HYPER BENCH. THANK YOU SO MUCH. MRS. MARY FLOOD.
customer_reviews.author: MARY FLOOD

customer_reviews.title: Stamina Hyper Bench
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other 5 star reviews. Very easy to assemble and very well made and sturdy. Now to see if it helps with my back ache and strengthens my core. If I am disappointed I will update this post, if I do not then all is well. Working on this slowly. Doing 10 reps forward and 10 reps backward and then resting for an hour. I will increase the number of reps and decrease the rest period over a period of weeks/months. So far it appears to be helping with backache and stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Hedley W. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Contrarily to some of the reviews I read before purchasing, I found it very easy to assemble. And in the end, it was worth the money because it is a great way to stretch the lower back, and also exercise. I love the fact that it can be folded and stored.
customer_reviews.author: anna tornello

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two and both were crooked and misaligned
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these benches and set it up, and I noticed that the hip rest as well as the arms were slightly crooked. It wasn’t too bad, but I’ve had back injuries so I didn’t want to spend money on something that could cause more harm. I ordered a second one to see if it was just a bad bench, but after setting that one up I realized it was even more crooked than the first. The machine is stable, but a misaligned exercise machine isn’t worth that much money, or the injuries it can cause. I returned both and am looking for another.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: When I first unpacked the bench the first thing I noticed was the really nice finish of the paint. Assembly was easy and I was impressed that they even included caps for the nuts/bolts. I used a impact driver to assemble, and find the bench very sturdy and of great quality. Would absolutely recommend to others and very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I used to use one of these at the gym and felt it helped strengthen my lower back. This one arrived quickly and was fairly easy to assemble, however it is very uncomfortable to use for reverse sit-ups. The model I used at the gym had a space in the middle of the flat plate. This one does not and as a result there's too much pressure on the pubic bone; so much so that it is very uncomfortable to use. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gator Girl

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy and safe. Beautiful red paint. High quality. Perfect for home use.
customer_reviews.text: I can't find anything I don't like about this. First, and most important, it is safe. It was carefully designed to be extremely sturdy so even with the locking pin missing it won't collapse. The locking pin is like a redundant safety. The pin is also designed not to fall out with vibration. The color is a beautiful red and all parts appear to be high quality. Nicely adjustable and very functional. Also, please be aware that the picture of this in the ad has the locking pin inserted incorrectly. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for someone 5’2”
customer_reviews.text: If you are under 5’5” or so, don’t bother. I am 5’2” and it’s way too tall. Since I don’t want to disassemble and repackage, I will figure out a way to make it work by placing blocks at the base to stand on. For this reason I haven’t used it yet, but it does seem sturdy. Will update if I find otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but it seems a little flimsy. I'm afraid to let my bigger friends try it (because I don't want them to get hurt; not because I worry they'll break it). It's also a little long for me, and I can't adjust it. That kinda sucks. So, I mean, it does its job and it was only 100 bucks, so I can't complain too much. The red is pretty. It went together easily enough. I'm glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Barber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: It went together easy. It sits stable when you use it. You can do back extensions and oblique crunches on it. It's not the same as a gym-quality piece that has to hold up to constant punishment, but it's perfect for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Harris

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that was similar to the one in the gym. This one will suffice, but it needs more padding on the cushion. Bending over is painful in any position. I have to use more padding such as a thick towel folded several times over. Other than that it is sturdy and looks like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Diana CJ

customer_reviews.title: Be careful how your item arrives.
customer_reviews.text: My equipment was thrown into the box, totally unwrapped, scratched, missing parts, missing the assembly manual and a complete mess. Returned item 10 days ago and still waiting for a refund. It gets a "0" for customer courtesy.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Victor

customer_reviews.title: Well made equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great for strengthening your whole back. The set-up was easy with clear instructions. The equipment is sturdy and seems well made. I’ve been using it for a couple of months and it’s showing no signs of wear or tear. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Guertin

customer_reviews.title: it is great. I have no excuse for not doing my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really made for men, my husband says, but my daughter and I use it. It is bigger than I thought, even folded up, but we emptied things out of our front closet and are able to slide it in there in an awkward yet functioning manner. So for us, it is great. I have no excuse for not doing my back exercises. It also isn't too heavy for either of us.
customer_reviews.author: wejo7185

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, such a good sturdy product. I use it every night and it holds up to everything. If you want strong erector muscles in your back and solid abdominals get this asap. I am a personal trainer for over ten years and I totally approve this product. The added dip bars is a great tool. You can also work your obliques on this which is great to be able to do at home in your living room. Very easy to put together and it does fold up nicely, it fits in a small shoe closet in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do, but ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do, but I am a little bit tall (6ft) for this and it uncomfortably squishes my jewels on ascension and descent. With that said, working through the discomfort, I was able to really help strengthen my lower back, and also stretch out all of the tight areas. And I dont have issues in that area anymore, so with pain comes pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: ReAl

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: First off, kudos for the fast shipping. The bench was easy to put together, though find your ratchet wrench. It fits the small space in my basement well so I look forward to long use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Raven

customer_reviews.title: Good construction but Not made for male anatomy.
customer_reviews.text: Good construction but Not made for male anatomy. If you’re male and you buy this unit, you’ll want to use something like a U-shaped neck pillow (like type sold for use on airlines) between yourself and the main rectangular pad to make room for your “equipment”. Otherwise, it’s very uncomfortable to use this unit.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Schuppert, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money. Easy to Take Out and Put Away (literally 5 seconds). Men be careful of squashing your junk.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to fold up and put away. Assembly was easy. Adjustable height means my wife & I can share it. Well padded. One minor negative point... other "roman chairs" have a gap in the padding in the middle for a man's... man parts. This one doesn't, so you have to tuck your man parts between your legs otherwise they'll get crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece more adjustability would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and stable; easily holds me at 215. My only slight criticism would be it would be nice if you could adjust the angle a bit. (The length IS adjustable)
customer_reviews.author: MHP1969

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for you home gym!
customer_reviews.text: Im 6'0 180lbs and this works great! Take your time putting it together, make sure everything is tight and it performs well. Good price, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: John Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good roman chair, good for shorter persons, women.
customer_reviews.text: I am short, only 5'1" and some, but not quite 5'2", and this works fine for me. I use it to continue work with my abdominals and lower back muscles in condition from some PT work I had gone through and wanted to keep up. This roman chair does the trick. It doesn't take up a lot of room, and it was easy to put together. It is quite sturdy, and the red color is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Moniva

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, low price, fast shipping. A+
customer_reviews.text: I love my hyper bench. This was one of my favorite things at the gym. It give a great core workout and is really nice for the arms too. I'm a woman and I do want to add mass... that's why I use this. I can do different exercises with this for different body parts. I assembled it on my own in about 30 minutes. The directions were easy to follow. My 4 yr old assisted with handing me the pieces. For less than 100 bucks I have my very own home gym.. running up and down our staircase, plus this means no more expensive memberships lol
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and was surprised to see how small of a package it came in. So some assembly is definitely required. I recommend using your own wrenches if you have them. I was able to assemble it just over a half hour and that included opening the package, and sorting parts. I immediately tried it and was happy with how solid it felt and easy to adjust to the proper height. Folds up for easy storage which is great for my small workout area.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pierpont

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice looking, and significantly adjustable. Pretty easy to assemble. Directions aren't completely detailed, but if you take your time and look at the pictures you'll do it correctly. Folds very easily for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Two Js

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: A great hyper-extension bench! It is very solid with a nice range of adjustments. Been wanting one for some time now and I am not disappointed!!! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom J

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly for a good workout set.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble as long as you have common sense but if not the instructions might throw you off. You will need a socket wrench screw using the cheap wrench that is provided or it will take you hours. Overall the workout set does the job and can be used for multiple workouts and has easy folding for when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great product if your back is aching this will repair it
customer_reviews.text: What did I like about this product everything was easy to install very durable and it’s helping me with my lower back very easy
customer_reviews.author: Frank Santamaria

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly to stretch my back. I always use the one at the gym, just hanging from it for a minute or so, which offers a nice release (and a bunch of pops). I got this so I'd have one at home to stretch whenever I feel tight, and it works great! Also very solid construction for the price, and pretty easy to put together. It has nice finishing touches, like the little rubber caps to go over the bolt heads.
customer_reviews.author: Rocketgal

customer_reviews.title: Great for lower back problems
customer_reviews.text: This little piece of equipment has alleviated my lower back problems that had plagued me for years. Bought mine years ago and it’s still like new. Bought another for a friend of mine with similar back problems. Just a few sets of 10 reps a few times a week and it strengthened my lower back muscles enough to eliminate my sore lower back within a couple of months!
customer_reviews.author: Theophilus

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: One of my fav pieces of equipment at the gym. I also like to do side bends on it which is a little difficult with this one but I manage. It appears to be a quality piece of equipment - especially for what it costs!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is okay. There were a few damaged pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. There were a few damaged pieces in the package. That was okay. But if you are a guy, you may feel a little uncomfortable in your crotch area because the pad is once complete piece. Otherwise I use it only for back extension
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Could easily earn five stars with a little extra padding.
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. I have lots of lower back pain, soreness and stiffness. I'm amazed at the difference that this makes. It only takes a couple of minutes use a few times a week to drastically reduce my lower back pain. It is a nice weight and sturdy piece of equipment for the price. I would give five stars if the padding was better. You definitely need a thick pillow or something similar to use this. I am happy with my purchase and would re-purchase if I had it to do over.
customer_reviews.author: L Powell

customer_reviews.title: pay attention to the assembly diagram and you should be fine. I'm 6'1" and have pad set to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Rugged. Foldable. I keep it in the kitchen and it stows next to the refrigerator. Comes with the necessary tools, pay attention to the assembly diagram and you should be fine. I'm 6'1" and have pad set to the lowest (shortest) level and this is good for me, my toes are still on the floor. If you are much shorter you might need to make an adjustment...
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my garage gym. I was hesitant to buy it because I did not see many reviews but I got this for 99 dollars and has helped strengthen my lower back with only a couple weeks of sporadic use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The Stamina Hyper Bench is the perfect equipment to have in a home gym as an ...
customer_reviews.text: The Stamina Hyper Bench is the perfect equipment to have in a home gym as an addition or used as a go to for all your exercise needs! The bench was packaged very well and is incredibly sturdy. So easy that it was put together in 20 minutes! There is an attachment that you can attach or remove as needed that targets the arms and chest. The cushion is extremely comfortable and easy to wipe down. By far, one of the best gym pieces I have used to help target muscles in the waist, back,legs and arms. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LizD

customer_reviews.title: High Quality without the high price
customer_reviews.text: Really great roman chair that's high quality, really sturdy, and comes at a great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, works well. It's nicer then I thought it would be. Although it's probably better then most at this price, if you're more than 200 pounds you may want a stronger piece of equipment. If you are a short person, it may be a bit long for you even at the shortest setting.
customer_reviews.author: jason b

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: just got it...easy to assemble..30 mins...looks like quality steel and welds...will update in 2 weeks....there was a bit of deformity in 2 of the foot pads but their customer service is excellent and is sending replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Lee P.

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid piece of home fitness equipment. Assembly was a bit of a project but I managed it myself and I am no handyman. My only complaint is that the length from the base (where you put your feet) to the top of the pad (which your hip crease rests on) is kind of long--my husband and I both keep it on the shortest setting and I wish I could go a tad bit shorter (I'm 5'5").
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ghais

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Good but not for heavy peoples I weight about 200lbs and I feel the wood moving a bit I feel it could break under a heavier weigh than me Other than that i like it works great for me and it take no place when folded
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm really into fitness and my whole garage is full of workout equipment. This was a great addition. It is built great, not wobbly at all like some of the equipment I have; very sturdy. Great for back, abs, and even turning sideways and working obliques by doing side situps. I also use it for dips, stretching, and situps during a hard workout when it's too killer to go all the way to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: This is good equipment for the money
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I have been using this bench for two years now and it's still working as new. I was initially concerned with durability since the bench is somewhat wobbly, but it is really not an issue. I raised the rating to 5 stars from 4. Both myself and my wife really like it. It's a very good deal for the money. This is good equipment for the money. It's not the same quality as what you see in a commercial gym, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great piece of equipment for the home gym!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of equipment for the home gym!!!!! It is very compact, stable & durable. It is also economical. You do typical Roman Chair exercises & also can do dips & push up exercises on the handle bars. Another thing I use it for is Preacher Curls. It works very well for this even though it was not specifically designed for it. It also folds up very easily & stores well. Thanks for producing a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark of Health

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and sturdy yet easy to fold and lean on a wall. Really works well into my exercises routines. I have been wanting one of these for some time, really pleased with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simply put...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simply put....this thing is garbage. I’m a whopping 175 pounds and the first time I pushed down on the “arm” of the bench it snapped at the weld. I contacted the seller asking them to send me a new one. They told me to call Amazon. Amazon told me to call the seller. The seller never responded. So....it’s a hundred dollar busted piece of metal sitting in my gym and will soon be a hundred dollar piece of metal sitting at the local junk yard. Total waste of money due to cheap welding and low quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: pg77

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble, folds up for storage, another piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ryken

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as an at-home supplement to regular workouts at the gym and at the suggestion of a physical therapist to help with back pain/ back strength. I've used it daily for a month now and I am very pleased with it because it is reasonably priced, simple to adjust and sturdy. For reference, I am a 5'7" female who weighs 120 pounds, and there is a height option which allows me to use the footrest comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broke Off
customer_reviews.text: I was exercising and one of the welded handles used for support actually broke off while I was using it. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... found I could adjust it so that it was pretty much perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This bench is well-made and I found I could adjust it so that it was pretty much perfect for me. I looked at the welding because of another reviewer's comments, and although I'm not technically qualified to say, I thought the welds looked fine. Irrespective of the price, this is a good piece of equipment. When you throw in the low price, it's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Roscommon Reader

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Seems like its made for people that are no taller than 5 foot 5
customer_reviews.author: JR smith

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a hyper extension and sit-up bench for quite some time. For the price, this is a solid piece of equipment. I do not recommend using the handlebars for chest pushups, one of mine bent right away. Other than that, i can also use it as a preacher curl bench which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: LanFear

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how well-made this was. It's comfortable for someone who is 5'7". It wasn't that hard to put together either.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and versatility
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, comes with tools needed, a 12 or 14 mm socket would come in handy though. Love that the seat/bench is adjustable, I'm 5'7, my son is 6'1, so we both tried it out in a matter of minutes. Fold flat which is a BONUS, didn't realize that when I bought it
customer_reviews.author: KrisKeh

customer_reviews.title: The only annoying thing I found about this bench was putting it ...
customer_reviews.text: The only annoying thing I found about this bench was putting it together- as other reviewers mention, you must be very precise screwing things together to make them fit. The padding is sufficiently comfortable when you are using it for crunches. I am on the heavier side but it does not wiggle or become unstable at all. This was a solid addition to my home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product, very well built, all steel, paint job is excellent, instructions are great, all parts present and accounted for. Assembly is straightforward with a couple of tools (provided). Folds up nicely. Given the choices available, choose this one! (Just a consumer, not paid or perk'd for this review.)
customer_reviews.author: Classical Hound

customer_reviews.title: Great AAA*
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Wish they provided better directions. You’ll be able to figure it out. People say it’s flimsy I feel like it’s because they don’t know how to set up this machine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rachman

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get a well rounded workout..
customer_reviews.text: No need for multiple pieces of bulky equipment around the house. This is a very versatile machine that gives you a good low level workout and stores away effortlessly. We love it. Easily assembles (10 - 15 minutes max). Everything you need comes in the box. Instructions are simple and clear. There's no excuse for you to not get this machine. So get up and get into shape with the Stamina Hyper Bench. #feeltheburn
customer_reviews.author: MILC

customer_reviews.title: Great ab bench for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for a woman of average weight. Constructed well. I feel secure on the bench when doing ab exercises. Not sure about what others have said about the unit and its quality, because it appears fine to me. Easy to assemble also.
customer_reviews.author: Marbear

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the reviews and the video that explained how great it is. This product is legit. Easy to use and very easy to put together. I will be using this product daily and it really looks sturdy and well made enough to last some years. Again glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: mike Daly

customer_reviews.title: SUPER STABLE!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER STABLE!!! I was worried about getting it and went back and forth a lot. It does not wabble, the top pad protects your hip bones and all that just fine. great support & by support i don't mean not helping me with exercise - keeping me where i need to be comfortably. The ONLY thing i will say - don't get this if you're short!!! but it's the best money i think i've ever spent on workout equipment equipment.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: good bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to a small home or office gym. It is easy to assemble and folds for storage. The design helps for making good exercise form and the handles help with safely getting on and off. the delivery was quick. This is a sturdy bench, it does wobble a bit but not enough to be of any concern.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckie

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to say that this product exceeded my expectations for quality, stability and functionality. Adjustments for height are super easy to make and the apparatus is completely stable when being used with no wobbling of any sort. Given it's affordability, I am beyond pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kida

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together (took about an hour), pretty sturdy and doesn't take up to much space. The foam tubes are a bit hard but good quality. Great product for such a low price. Only con, wish it had a foot plates, however, you can still get a good lower back workout as long as you wear sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Diego M

customer_reviews.title: okay for normal size people. the price is great though.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to put together. Had to take a few breaks. Around 2 hours in total with no help. All the pieces were there however, I found the bolts very tight to manually tighten with wrenches. I'm about 160 pounds and it's okay in sturdiness, but I cant imagine a taller and larger person on this.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a really good glute workout
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to use proper form with this. Use your glutes, not your back. This is a wonderful addition to anyone's home gym. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: OptimusAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1", 185lbs. I can use this with no problem. I purchased the X Hyper without the Ab. Considering it is a home gym product it's pretty sturdy. And it can be folded up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: SixString

customer_reviews.title: eh..ok?!
customer_reviews.text: seems flimzy, but works not a bad buy, but expected something a little more sturdy. feels like the pad is going to break.. the plastic feet should be flush, the circles cut into my rubber floor had to flip them over. overall eh... ok.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone 6 feet tall or under
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone 6 feet tall or under. A bit difficult for anyone taller but overall a nice bench. Good for building the abdominal wall & lower back muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Honest co.

customer_reviews.title: I hate assembling things
customer_reviews.text: I hate assembling things, but this was easy. My boyfriend had to tighten everything, but everything else I did on my own. Very sturdy and light enough to move around for this 115 lb. lady.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any home gym!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is made from quality parts, no wobble at all on a carpeted floor. Great for core and lower back. Folds easily when not in use. Assembly is simple and straight forward. While it comes with its own wrenches, I recommend using a socket wrench - the bolts are 17mm. As others have said, assemble everything first and then tighten everything down.
customer_reviews.author: cgusto

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this for 6 months, then finally jumped in. Works great, after a few uses my lower back strength is improved and it has reduced pain. Word of caution men, it's a nut crusher, so keep your thighs slightly spread to accommodate your junk when you lay on the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Its a little small but it does fold up store nicely for the price it does what its suppose to
customer_reviews.text: works well set up was fast and very straight forward. Its a little small but it does fold up store nicely for the price it does what its suppose to. wouldn't recumbent for anyone over 6 ft
customer_reviews.author: kH

customer_reviews.title: Injury waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.text: Breaks easily. Also bends at every connected bolt. Kind of warped after several uses. I weigh 165 and I was able to bend the bar dip handle after first use. Buy something better
customer_reviews.author: USA Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for low back extensions!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this product today after it arrived; instructions were clear and easy to follow, however, I recommend using a socket wrench to help tighten the bolts. Feels sturdy and looks great. I like how it gives two options for the roller placement. I tried the upper position as recommended but then changed it to the lower position. I use this apparatus for both lower back extensions and side oblique crunches. I felt comfortable doing both and look forward to continue using the Stamina! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Easy to put together, it took about 20 min. I'm a big guy 6ft 295 lbs. and it supports me just fine. I don't feel like it's going to fall apart or tip over. I recommend using a socket set instead of the wrenches they supply just because you can go faster and tighten everything a lot better. My only complaint is that one of the smaller bolts had a rounded head. I had a extra one in the tool box so it was an easy fix. It's light and folds up nice too for when you need space.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Souza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Angeli

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-built, attractive piece of equipment. Doesn't take up a lot of space. I recommend adding weights (dumbbell, kettlebell, etc.) once you are comfortable with this particular exercise. Terrific for strengthening lower back muscles, which are far too often engulfed in pain simply for being ignored and never specifically addressed.
customer_reviews.author: k9rescuer702

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a very fair price
customer_reviews.text: I love this item , one of the best purchases I've made and I enjoy using it . I want people to know that this company does make a great product . Looking to get the stamina x air rower next
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great machine . Delivery was fast . It came the next day after purchase . It was easy to put together. Great price for what it does!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetjanuary

product_meta.title: Stamina Hyper Bench, Red
product_meta.description: The Stamina X Hyper Bench gives you terrific core strength, ripped abs and powerful back muscles. Work your upper and middle abs with multiple crunch positions. The pull of a pin quickly and easily adjusts the angle of the bench to increase or decrease your workout intensity.
feature_bullets: Use with or without dumbbells for ripped abs and a strong back
Thickly padded bench with durable stitched vinyl upholstery
Adjustable footrest and backrest, to accommodate height

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
